topics.body:
I just got done with that first episode...

[spoiler]So Eren's mom's dead
The city is pretty much screwed beyond all reason
And now Eren's gonna grow up into a very angry child
A. VERY. ANGRY. CHILD.[/spoiler]

This is going to be one very interesting anime. And unlike that fabulous magical boy anime, *_this one is clearly not fooling around at all_*. I expect much great things from it, if what I've heard about it.

Also, that animation is actually pretty dang good.
And the soundtrack still sounds really incredible, even among the chaos and death going on.

_And that theme.
So freaking great._
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
